snippet: Supporters of Donald J. Trump, who has been criticized for months for his comments on race, are planning to create a website that will showcase other supporters of Mr. Trump — who is a native of a diverse city but who is running in a party primary dominated by older, whiter voters — in an effort to tell a different side of his story.
abstract: Supporters of Donald J. Trump, who has been criticized for months for his comments on race, are planning to create a website that will showcase other supporters of Mr. Trump — who is a native of a diverse city but who is running in a party primary dominated by older, whiter voters — in an effort to tell a different side of his story.

headline.main: With New Effort, Group Hopes to Show Donald Trump Has a Multicultural Appeal
